title: Kasikci Dede Cig Kofte
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out, Turkish
description: Previously named Kahta Cigkofte, but changed name in early 2014, same owner. Cigkofte is southern Turkish specialty. Traditionally prepared with raw meat, however usage of raw meat is forbidden since a decade. Cigkofte places like Kahta use ground walnut and almond instead of meat, together with bulgur and spices. All food is vegan, only a drink type (ayran) contains milk.
